svg.text: HYBRID AI/CODE ARSENAL DEVELOPMENT — D−15 → D−7

g.text: • Inherits full privileges from the AI agent
• Dynamic Lua script generation via local LLM
• Crafted for Slack and Email integration flows
• Embedded in documents or external sources
• Hijacks the LLM execution logic upon read
Combining code and AI bypasses legacy antivirus tools
The ClawHub marketplace features minimal barriers: according to Snyk, 13.4% of skills contain critical
vulnerabilities. More alarmingly, 91% of confirmed malicious skills use a hybrid approach (Prompt
Injection + Traditional Malware) specifically designed to bypass legacy endpoint defenses.
OpenClaw Killchain Analysis — F. Pizzi — Univ. Paris Sorbonne, 2026 — Infographic v2.1
Entirely fictional scenario — No actual attack was conducted
